name: Bruce's Poor Man's Crab Cakes
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh herbs, such as parsley and chives, chopped
2 tablespoons green onion tops, finely chopped

instructions.en: Break the chicken into very small bits and squeeze out all moisture.
Shape mixture into 4 patties on a wax paper-lined baking sheet.
Cover with plastic wrap and chill for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Fry patties 4-5 minutes per side until golden brown.

notes: Makes 2-4 servings. Can be frozen. The recipe creator used two 10-ounce cans of white meat chicken, which yielded 10 ounces of meat after draining. Nutritional information is based on the actual amount of chicken used, not the pre-drained weight.
